title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1557/96 of 30 July 1996 setting the trigger levels for additional import duties on certain fruit and vegetables
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1557/96 of 30 July 1996 setting the trigger levels for additional import duties on certain fruit and vegetables
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The trigger levels for the additional import duties referred to in Article 2 of Regulation (EC) No 1555/96 for the 1996/97 marketing year shall be as indicated in the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 September 1996.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 July 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 118, 20. 5. 1972, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 132, 16. 6. 1995, p. 8.
(3) See page 1 of this Official Journal.
(4) OJ No L 336, 23. 12. 1994, p. 22.
ANNEX
